metadata.titel_preek: The “Long Game” in the Short Run

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The movement from a world of violence and 'skirmishes' to the realization of God's Kingdom/New Creation, where the 'long game' of divine well-being outflanks the 'short run' of despair.

tekstueel_bewijs: God is relentless and tenacious about that outcome.
God’s will... will come to fruition.
God notices and remembers those who serve.
God’s will for the well-being, peace, and justice of the world.
The readings for today give us three wondrous phrases.
This deep conviction of faith was nicely voiced in the film...

ontvanger.identificatie: The World / The Needy / The Hearers
tekstueel_bewijs: God’s will for the well-being... of the world.
Rejoice that your names are written in heaven.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: Does hearer identify with Subject or Receiver?

tekstueel_bewijs: It comes in his very person... and in the ministry of his disciples.
The disciples have healing juices and capacities entrusted to them by God.
helper.rol_van_god: God is Subject; Jesus is the primary Helper/Mediator.
helper.rol_van_geest: External help (implied as 'authority' given to disciples).

tegenstander.identificatie: The Old World / Rome / Violence / Death
tekstueel_bewijs: The demons want to negate life.
The force of the present tense.
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is characterized as 'every combine of ruthless power' and 'the force of death,' requiring a divine 'outflanking.'

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical response of the believer to the 'long game' by engaging in 'short-term mandates.'
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer / The Church
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The 'long-term indicative' (God's act) brings with it 'short-term imperatives' (Man's act).

voorbeelden_god_subject: God has destined the world for well-being.
God’s power for life will trump the force of death.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: We must work for the good of all.
The followers of Jesus are a great force.

voorbeelden: Do not grow weary in doing what is right.
We know that the Kingdom of God has drawn near.
The disciples have healing juices... entrusted to them.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on 'Knowing' (Savoir) the long-term reality to enable 'Doing' (Devoir) in the short term. The 'Pouvoir' (Power) is explicitly gifted by God.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: Moves from S2 (Boston bombing) to S1 (Kingdom near), then addresses the tension of living in ~S2 (the short run) without falling into ~S1 (complacency).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The 'Long Game' (S1) is the ontological reality that makes the 'Short Run' (S2) bearable and actionable.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the sermon acknowledges 'dreadful bombing' and 'zones of death' as real forces.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon maintains God as the primary Subject of the 'Long Game.' Human action is framed as a secondary program enabled by divine authority and promise.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: The long-term indicative brings with it short-term imperatives.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as the source of competence
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: The disciples have healing juices and capacities entrusted to them by God.
God is relentless and tenacious about that outcome.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The disciples and the Psalmist are used as models for how to 'call out' God and act, but they are framed as recipients of divine authority first.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Theocentric: God is the one who empowers the disciples; God is the one who hears the Psalmist.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Encouragement and mobilization without the weight of ultimate success.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Soteriology precedes ethics; the 'indicative' grounds the 'imperative'.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Excellent integration of the 'Long Game' (Soteriology) and 'Short Run' (Ethics).
spanning_punten: The tension between 'God is not a score-keeping God' and the 'mandate' to work for the good of all.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: God’s power for life will trump the force of death.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully positions God as the Subject of the cosmic narrative while inviting humans into a participatory secondary role.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Explicitly mention the Holy Spirit as the current 'Pouvoir' in the short run.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: Strongly defined as cosmic and systemic.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in maintaining theocentricity while addressing urgent social and ethical concerns.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric would focus on the 'Long Game' metaphor, Greimas reveals that God remains the 'engine' (Subject) even when the preacher discusses human work.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Psalm; semiotics shows how the Psalmist's 'calling out' is a narrative move to restore God as the active Subject.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'authority' given to disciples is a 'Modal Competence' (Pouvoir) that prevents the sermon from becoming pure moralism.

appendices.notities: The sermon uses 'poetic idiom' as a Sender of values, effectively bridging the gap between ancient text and modern context.
